data.title: Cross-Species Single-Cell Analysis of Pancreatic Ductal Adenocarcinoma Reveals Antigen-Presenting Cancer-Associated Fibroblasts
data.meta_description: A previously unknown class of cancer-associated fi broblasts with unique immune properties may contribute to the immunosuppressive PDAC microenvironment.
